summary: This mod just replaces the characters dialogue when speaking to Valerica. Aimed to be heated and passionate.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][b][size=4]DISCLAIMER[/size][/b][size=3] : This is my first mod so please don't come to my house bearing pitchforks! I'm too young to die! :P [/size]



[b][size=5]Description :[/size][/b]

[size=3]On a more serious note, this is something I made so that the player does not sound so unmoved by Valerica's verbal assault when you first meet. If your character is not hot tempered or passionate, this is not what our looking for.

This will make the character more outraged at being questioned and ridiculed by a heartless vampire who locked her daughter in a stone tomb for thousands of years. See how you like the changes and drop a comment to let me know.[/size]

[size=3]Also this works especially well if your using Amorous Adventures and pursuing a romance with Serana, but it is not required for this mod to work.[/size]
[size=5]
[/size][b][size=5]
Requirements : [/size]

[/b][size=3]Nothing, but the base game and Dawnguard
[/size][size=5]
[b]
Installation :[/b][/size]

[size=3][b]Manual[/b] -- Extract then drag and drop into the Data folder. Enable esp in the launcher. Then play.[/size][/font][size=3]
[/size][font=Times New Roman][size=3]
[b]NMM and Mod Organizer[/b] -- download with manager and enable. Play.[/size]

[size=5][b]
Uninstall [/b]:[/size]

[size=3]Just delete the esp and your set. As far as I'm aware.

[/size][/font]
author: Grecia300
